description:
I spotted Brent in front of an apartment building where he was tooling his bike. I had seen him several times before, but never had that perfect moment to approach him. He always seemed to have his shirt off, with his pants hanging low around his hips. I just can't resist a guy with a cute face and nice torso...
He came to the studio to do his video in his pickup truck, with his bike in the back. We thought it would be fun to take him to some of the local trails and film him doing some tricks. Luckily, it had rained recently, so we were able to get him nice and muddy before taking him back for a nice, hot bath.
title: Brent
